content.text:
# Tennis performance timeline comparison (men)

This article compares the Grand Slam and Olympic tournament results of male tennis players who reached at least one Grand Slam final. The Grand Slam tournaments are the Australian Open, the French Open, Wimbledon, and the U.S. Open. All data is from the International Tennis Federation men's circuit [https://www.itftennis.com/en/players/ database].
Legend
Less frequent qualifiers are explained in the notes below the table.
Athletes in bold are considered to be still in championship tennis.
1967–1972
:Winner of most titles: Rod Laver, with 5.
